roleset.name: retail practice of sending items from a manufacturer to customer, ship directly from wholesaler to customer

example.name: Null subject only
example.text: You have to realize when-4 PRO dropshipping *T*-4, the profit margin is VERY thin.

example.name: All args
example.text: They drop shipped them directly to me from Redranger.

example.name: args 0, 1, 2
example.text: On all purchases, I would make payment to the supplier/manufacture prior to their dropshipping the items to my customers.

roleset.note: DROPSHIP-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01-3. Framed by Claire. Comparison to ship.01. (from dropship.01-v)
DROPSHIPPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, dropship-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls send-11.1-1. (from dropshipping.01-n)
